about1:
I'm a Freelance Graphics developer
specialized in WebGL/WebGPU.
about2:
I make Award winning Websites, Games and
Installations for Agencies around the world.
about3:
Here you will find a very small
selection of the things I made.
foodforfish:
I made this little game to test out
my WebGPU engine.

It has deferred rendering, SSAO,SSR,
DOF and a lot of other nice stuff.
You can find the source code on
my Github, and it won
FWA of the month!
instructions:
Use arrow keys and spacebar
or use your favorite controller
